name: fabric-time-in-sync

utc.description: UTC, in seconds, to check against to see if the device's current time is syncronized with.

GET.summary:
Checks whether the other FortiGate device's time in the Security Fabric is in sync with the specified utc timestamp (in seconds) 
 Access Group: any

help: Checks whether the other FortiGate device's time in the Security Fabric is in sync with the specified utc timestamp (in seconds)

synchronized.name: synchronized
synchronized.title: Synchronized
synchronized.description: True if the specified timestamp, in seconds, is almost the same as the device's current time as the time of receiving the request.

response_description: Result of checking whether the specified timestamp, in seconds, is almost same as the device at the time when the request was received. It is considered almost the same if the difference is within 2 minutes.

utc.name: utc
utc.summary: UTC, in seconds, to check against to see if the device's current time is syncronized with.
